# Staircase Problem

Open the .go file and read the comments to see more.

Here is example output from calculating 
the number of ways to climb a staircase with 100 steps (`n = 100`)
With memoization using a hashmap, it's pretty fast:
~~~
RunTime: 89.737Âµs
~~~
